snippet: Tennis fans should intoxicate themselves on the elixir still being served up by the best men's generation to grace the game before the well dries up and mere mortals take over, at least that's what the doom-mongers think....
lead_paragraph: Tennis fans should intoxicate themselves on the elixir still being served up by the best men's generation to grace the game before the well dries up and mere mortals take over, at least that's what the doom-mongers think.

headline.print_headline: Next Generation Ready to Break Out of the Shadows in Tennis
headline.main: Next Generation Ready to Break Out of the Shadows in Tennis
